Clockwork:AdaptiveCannon.NAME: Adaptive Cannon
Clockwork:AdaptiveCannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play this card, reduce its cost by !M! for this combat.

Clockwork:AdaptiveShield.NAME: Adaptive Shield
Clockwork:AdaptiveShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you play this card, reduce its cost by !M! for this combat.

Clockwork:ChargingBlade.NAME: Charging Blade
Clockwork:ChargingBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Every time this card is played, increase its damage by !M! for this combat.
Clockwork:ChargingBlade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Every time this card is played, increase its damage by !M! for this combat. NL Rebound.

Clockwork:ChargingShield.NAME: Charging Shield
Clockwork:ChargingShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Every time this card is played, increase its Block by !M! for this combat.
Clockwork:ChargingShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Black. NL Every time this card is played, increase its Block by !M! for this combat. NL Rebound.

Clockwork:CogToss.NAME: Cog Toss
Clockwork:CogToss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! Cogs to your draw pile. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

Clockwork:CraftMomentumEngine.NAME: Craft: M. Engine
Clockwork:CraftMomentumEngine.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Momentum. NL Acquire a Momentum Engine. NL Fleeting.

Clockwork:DefectiveCog.NAME: Defective Cog
Clockwork:DefectiveCog.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL When this card is exhausted, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
Clockwork:DefectiveCog.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL When this card is exhausted, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

Clockwork:HelicalCog.NAME: Helical Cog
Clockwork:HelicalCog.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
Clockwork:HelicalCog.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

Clockwork:Pluck.NAME: Pluck
Clockwork:Pluck.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! Cog to your hand. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
Clockwork:Pluck.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! Cogs to your hand. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

Clockwork:StasisBreak.NAME: Stasis Break
Clockwork:StasisBreak.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Ignores the effect of Stasis.

Clockwork:SpurCog.NAME: Spur Cog
Clockwork:SpurCog.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
Clockwork:SpurCog.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

Clockwork:WarmUp.NAME: Warm Up
Clockwork:WarmUp.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Cannot be played after other cards in a turn. NL Gain !M! Stasis. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have already played a card this turn.
